title: Girl In Pieces
lyrics:
I ain't ever seen a heart so broken
I ain't never seen a face so sad
If he was dumb enough to screw you over
He must notta known what he had
The green in your eyes is all over the floor
But it's friday night and I'm at your door

'Cause I don't wanna see you cryin'

No you ain't gonna cry no more



I see a girl in pieces

Baby let me pick you up

Get you back on your feet

Give you love, love, love



Well, I hate that he hurt you

But I gotta healing touch

I see a girl in pieces

Let me pick you up

And show you love, love, love



That chandelier smile

You're hiding

Is 'bout to get the switch flipped on

'Cause when your little light ain't shining

The whole world is singing a sad song



Go get you high heels

Put 'em on your feet

I ain't takin' no

You're comin' out with me

'Cause I don't wanna see you cryin'

Baby don't cry no more



I see a girl in pieces

Come on let me pick you up

Get you back on your feet

Give you love, love, love



Well I hate that he hurt you

But I gotta healing touch

I see a girl in pieces

Let me pick you up

And show you love, love, love



Yeah

Whoa-oh



I see a girl in pieces

Baby let me pick you up

Yeah, I know what you need, damn

And it's love, love, love



Well, I hate that he hurt you

But I gotta healing touch

I see a girl in pieces

Let me pick you up

Show you love, love, love



Yeah

Whoa-oh



I hate that he hurt you

But I gotta healing touch

I see a girl in pieces

Let me pick you up

And show you love, love, love
